Print Email <>More than 15 industry experts available to support your final buying decision 
<>For more than a decade, Current Analysis' analysts have been providing clients with analysis built upon the foundation of objective, unbiased research. Many of our analysts are former product managers or have held other positions in the industry. 
Today, all of our analysts conform to the highest levels of integrity and ethics, and do not engage in any activity that may compromise these values. Save time and money 
Making important IT buying decisions can be difficult and executing a thorough RFP process can be an extremely time-consuming process. IT Connection provides users with easy-to-read assessments of the key suppliers and products within a given technology area so users can confidently create their short list. 
If you're considering an IT equipment purchase, IT Connection will help you assess potential technology solutions to your business problem, create a short list of possible suppliers to choose from, and make an efficient and informed buying decision. IT Connection provides expert insights 
On the market: What trends and emerging technologies will affect future purchasing requirements? Where is innovation taking place, how to take advantage? 
On vendors: How to keep track of vendor product lines, strategies and roadmaps Which are the best products and service solutions? Which vendors are the strong competitors and market discruptors? 
On buying decisions: How to make the right technical choice at the right price What does it take to be 'intelligence ready' for more effective negotiations? How to speed up the time to make procurement decisions? About Current Analysis 
<>Current Analysis' primary business is providing competitive analysis and solution assessments to telecommunication service providers and infrastructure companies worldwide. IT Connection repurposes our expert analysis and evaluations of competitive solutions to enable businesses, and their IT leaders, to make better planning and purchasing decisions. Contact Details
